scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:v6-in@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: v6-in <sip:v6-in@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:v6-in@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:v6-in@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
